description: Please select a world collection from the world menu.
• Reeborg default: the collection of worlds shown initially.
These worlds can be and should be solved using only functions
with no arguments, and without using variables, following the
• Saskatchewan CS 20: a collection adapted from the worlds used in the
Computer Science 20 open textbook created by Dan Schellenberg.
Note that the reorganization of worlds into different collections is not completed.
